Seller's comments

This Stunning Brand New Holden Colorado 2013 DX combines smart features and a pure driving experience. This car is as hard as nails when it comes to a working vehicle. It has airbags - driver & passenger, air conditioning and footrest - drivers. Comes with 3 years / 100000 km new car warranty. This car has door pockets - 1st row (Front). This car has limited slip diff, tow bar, audio - input for iPod and cup holders - 1st row. It has bottle holders - 1st row. This car has central locking - key proximity. It has EBD (Electronic brake force distribution) and power steering.

Previous model. Limited availability.

  • Overview
    While undoubtedly a global effort, the new RG Colorado includes a substantial injection of 'Australian-isation'. Safety, durability and towing capacity were targeted for the local market, along with major input into the accessory range. GMH sites a rigorous test program that pushed componentry way beyond normal life expectancy. It's a single turbodiesel range with either five-speed manual or six-speed auto in 2X4 and 4X4 configurations. Load capacity ranges from ~1 to 1.4 tonnes, with towing capacity from 3 to 3.5 tonnes. With four airbags for all variants and the appropriate electronic safety aids it earns a five star ANCAP rating.

Specifications have been sourced from redbook.com.au and are based on manufacturer standard specifications. Actual specifications for this vehicle may differ, please confirm with the seller.

*Where the price contains the notation "Drive Away No More to Pay" or "Drive Away Price" the price includes additional costs, such as stamp duty and other government charges. Please confirm price and features with the seller of the vehicle.
